A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Surprised this is currently so low on audience score. I've been a big fan of the recent movies and really enjoyed this one as well. It was a bit of a crowd pleaser\, and wasn't afraid to pull the rug out from under you- which kept you engaged. Wish it was slightly less action and a little more story\, but it's a Star Wars movie so... can't complain
